DESCRIPTION: #yFish are random Colorless cards that grant a small benefit, replace themselves, and #yExhaust.

#ySummon. At the end of your turn deals damage to the lowest health enemy.
#ySummon. At the end of your turn deals damage to a random enemy and applies #yWeak or #yVulnerable.
A creature that has a 50% chance to perform one of these two actions at the start of each turn. NL - Draws you a card. NL - Steals a card from you, returning it at the start of next turn.
A creature that has a 50% chance to perform one of these two actions after you play a card. NL - Deals its damage to you. NL - Deals its damage to a random enemy.
A creature that attacks the enemy with the lowest health multiple times, affected by attack modifiers.
